title: FS (Lower than Rock Bottom Pricing)-3 Mid-Grade SGC Tolstoi's; Hummel, Jordan, Schlei
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS (Lower than Rock Bottom Pricing)-3 Mid-Grade SGC Tolstoi's; Hummel, Jordan, Schlei
posts.post_content:
For Sale (Even lower than as low as I can go) - Three really great looking T206 SGC graded Tolstoi's.  Prices includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 John Hummel Tolstoi SGC 4 (slight wet sheet transfer on front) - $320 pp ff

T206 Tim Jordan batting, Tolstoi SGC 3 - $275 pp ff

T206 Admiral Schlei batting, Tolstoi SGC 3 (clear wet sheet transfer on front) - $275 pp ff

Ryan is indeed a lower graded pop player with more Old Mills being graded by PSA than the Piedmont 350s
Great looking card and GLWS
Bump new pricing and Tolstoi's added.
Last bump for price reductions.  The Jordan is especially nice.
Bump lowest I can go on pricing.
Even lower pricing than I thought I could go.
